remarks: The result of a matrix transformation.  (Contributed by AV, 31-Jul-2019.)
statement:
mat2pmatfval.t $e |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) $.
mat2pmatfval.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mat2pmatfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
mat2pmatfval.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
mat2pmatfval.s $e |- S = ( algSc ` P ) $.
mat2pmatval $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V /\ M e. B ) -> ( T ` M ) = ( x e. N , y e. N |-> ( S ` ( x M y ) ) ) ) $.
$d M x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d R x y $.
